Headline: #52A South Kedzie Temporary Reroute at 83rd/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 83rd, Western, 79th and Kedzie due to, street blockage near 83rd/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 83rd, Western, 79th and Kedzie due to, street blockage near 83rd/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Garfield
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Garfield due to police activity.

Shuttle buses requested to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
